home.story: Wessel van Dalen is a full-stack software developer from The Netherlands who enjoys climbing mountains, working out, hanging with friends & girlfriend and learning Norwegian.

about.1: I'm Wessel, a full-stack software developer passionate about turning ideas into elegant, functional, and impactful digital experiences.
about.2: With {experience} year(s) of experience in Software Development, I take pride in being a positive addition to the team, both with a good spirit and high quality code.
about.3: I'm a very big fan of Norway (and Norwegian), and I would love to explore all possibilities to work in Norway - both remote and (preferably) at the office.

education.description: Completed a 4-year bachelor's degree with a focus on software development, including web development, databases and system design/architecture. Specialized in web development and design.
